entry.title: WPPConnect minor release: v1.17.0
entry.summary: Today we are releasing minor version v1.17.0 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing minor version v1.17.0 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.11.0 (43ae2c6)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.11.1 (8c5de17)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.12.0 (#1333) (fix #1330) (ecda056)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.126 (#1269) (fa954fc)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.128 (c853397)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.131 (f3588f7)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.133 (0a04393)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.135 (a9376cc)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.143 (3138b36)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.145 (1426644)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.150 (7c4ff9e)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.154 (#1334) (daa94ef)
  • Fixed setOnlinePresence method (1ae2658)
  • Updated WhatsApp WEB version to 2.2234.x (3edc013)

Features​

  • Added client.getLabelById function (fix #278) (5ecfcb6)
  • Added client.getPlatformFromMessage function (756775e)
  • Added client.markPlayed function (fix #706) (72a70f3)
  • Added client.sendReadStatus function (#673) (f0361b9)
  • Added functions to get, edit, delete products and collections of catalog (fix #363, fix #905) (bbcdfa9)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WA-JS minor release: v2.12.0
entry.summary: Today we are releasing minor version v2.12.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing minor version v2.12.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed buttons rendering on WhatsApp WEB >= 2.2234.6 (49e8311)
  • Fixed group metadata from chat list (8b1dea1)
  • Fixed group.participant_changed event for WhatsApp >= 2.2234.6 (wppconnect-team/wppconnect#1330) (b60a9b6)

Features​

  • Added WPP.conn.markAvailable and WPP.conn.markUnavailable functions (019bd36)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WA-JS minor release: v2.11.0
entry.summary: Today we are releasing minor version v2.11.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing minor version v2.11.0 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Added support for reply status stories (#594) (19b2729)
  • Update minimum require Whatsapp version to >= 2.2212.4-beta (bcb5f36)

Features​

  • Added create, edit, and delete products functions (fix #442) (8e8bb22)
  • Added get, create, edit, and delete collections functions (fix #442) (ef6192b)
  • Added option to get only media, url and docs for WPP.chat.getMessages (a74ac3c)
  • Added WPP.catalog.getProductById function (0b883a3)
  • Added WPP.catalog.getProducts function (f4d1716)
  • Added WPP.catalog.setProductVisibility function (d3a60e3)
  • Added WPP.catalog.updateCartEnabled function (b70af87)
  • Added WPP.chat.canMarkPlayed function (4149eec)
  • Added WPP.chat.getPlatformFromMessage function (d0f41ee)
  • Added WPP.chat.markPlayed function (c21941f)
  • Added WPP.contact.getBusinessProfile function (5c8e57a)
  • Added WPP.labels.getLabelById function (56767b4)
  • Added WPP.profile.editBusinessProfile function (30f18b2)
  • Added WPP.status.sendReadStatus (a4587dc)
  • Exported calculateFilehashFromBlob from WhatsApp (c0c0772)
  • Exported ProductCatalogSession from WhatsApp (0aefe4c)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WPPConnect patch release: v1.14.5
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v1.14.5 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v1.14.5 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Adding Missing Typing in GroupMetadata (30f1caa)

  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.98 (e342c41)
  • Fixed getAllGroups method (fix #1089, fix #1188) (4efb0cf)
  • Improved onAnyMessage for ciphertext messages (7eb9e59)
  • Improved onMessage event to re-trigger message after ciphertext (fix #1065) (b9ff808)
  • Improved onPresenceChanged event (d71835f)
  • typings: Adding Missing Typing in Chat (a6afdd1)
  • Updated @wppconnect/wa-js to v2.8.1 (fix #1196) (8ecaa6b)

Features​

entry.title: WA-JS patch release: v2.8.1
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v2.8.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v2.8.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed chat.live_location_update event when there are a current shared location (085a719)
  • Fixed chat.msg_ack_change event to ignore non my messages (78e5d49)
  • Fixed WPP.chat.markIsUnread function (wppconnect-team/wppconnect#1196) (db7195e)
  • Improved chat.presence_change event to use queueMicrotask (34dd0d6)
  • Update status v3 contacts before send (96fa79b)
  • Use non obstructive trigger for chat.new_message event (07316fb)

Features​

  • Trigger chat.new_message event for ciphertext msg after sync (3338cce)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WA-JS patch release: v2.7.1
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v2.7.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v2.7.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed compatibility with WhatsApp Web >= 2.2222.8 (a1d994c)
  • Return undefined instead of throw an exception (817592b)

Features​

  • Added Google Analytics (946cc80)
  • Added WPP.call.rejectCall function (4461cb0)
  • Added WPP.catalog.getMyCatalog function (7922931)
  • Aded call.incoming_call event (e318902)

BREAKING CHANGES​

  • Now "not found module" will return undefined value instead of throw an exception

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WPPConnect patch release: v1.13.3
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v1.13.3 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v1.13.3 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes.

Bug Fixes​

  • Clear all token data when disconnected (fix #1147) (4abcfed)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.4.1 (#1139) (3407555)
  • Fixed and deprecated method sendLinkPreview (fix: #1146) (d2bd6aa)
  • Fixed and deprecated sendMessageWithThumb method (fix #1067) (d0c0ad0)
  • Fixed sendImageAsStickerGif and sendImageAsSticker methods (fix #1138) (8fcd94a)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WPP Server patch release: v1.3.2
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v1.3.2 for WPP Server with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v1.3.2 for WPP Server with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed send-buttons endpoint (#711) (794e00f)

Features​

  • Added customUserDataDir by default to config.json (#712) (1b1a332)
  • lib atualizada (189d35c)

For more information, see the release page.
